title: Shared Clipboard via Bluetooth for paired Windows 10 devices
body: Instead of having to use onenote or other cloud based apps to share single text copy - or worse, saving it to file and doing a file transfer via Bluetooth. Would prefer that Win10 Clipboard be BlueTooth aware - allowing paired devices to share clipboard (uni-directional or bi-directional). Useful for copying/pasting URLs or snippets of code.
